directions.d: Bring a pot of water to a boil.
Add macaroni to boiling water and cook for 6 to 8 minutes.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Farenheight(175 degrees Celcius).
In a 9x13-inch baking dish,combine the macaroni,tuna,and soup.
Mix well,and then top with cheese.
Bake at 350 degrees F(175 degrees C) for about 35 minutes,or until bubbly
Sprinkle with fried onions, and bake for another 5 minutes.
